content: the last st on this needle to the sole sts so there will be an equal number of sts on both sides knit the remaining sole sts shape toe toe decrease round *k1 ssk knit to 3 sts before marker k2tog k1 repeat from * across sole stitches knit one round repeat these 2 rounds a total of 8 9 10 11 times till 14 sts remain on each needle 28 sts total then repeat the decrease round only 2 times till 10 sts remain remain on each needle cut yarn leaving a long tail and use kitchener stitch to close the toe
